page.title: 03MUCKLETON FARM
page.content: The farm has 161 acres of land.The farmer and his wife hope their children will carry on the farm. They grow barley, wheat, grass, sugar-beet. They have a lot of machinery.They keep the animals for profit. They encourage a lot of wildlife and they see owls, curlews, rabbits, hares, foxes and other animals. They keep {sheep}and{cattle.}The sheep they have are{English Half Breed.They also keep a few Jacob {Sheep.}They shear the sheep in {May.} They go to market at {Wellington}and Shrewsbury. They have{footpaths}and don't mind people walking on them but would like one footpath re-routed. The land was called the{Wytheford {Estate}then it was split up.They own a cottage plus their land.
